Utils

Class Line3

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Line3

  • public class Line3
extends java.lang.Object
    Line3 is a common implementation of a 3D infinite line. Every lines verify this equation for every X : X = director * t + point Where X, director and point are 3D vectors, and t double
    Since:
    2.0
